nodes.text: Meredith Rusu is a children's book author and editor who specializes in books based on television and movies, including Star Wars. She wrote the Star Wars Rebels tie-in books Ezra's Wookiee Rescue, The Inquisitor's Trap, and Always Bet on Chopper. She has written children's short stories adapting Star Wars films and comics for the anthologies The Original Trilogy Stories, The Prequel Trilogy Stories, 5-Minute Star Wars Stories Strike Back, and Galactic Adventures Storybook Collection. Rusu is also the author of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures, a junior novel based on the Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures animated series.
